pregnancy to stay healthy. This should be done with respect and taking into consideration the feasibility of the
advice and exploring alternatives.
• Daily oral ferrous sulphate, folic acid and calcium supplementation is recommended for pregnant women (see
antenatal care chapter for doses).
• The use of other multiple micronutrients, (e.g. Zinc, Vit D, etc) without the prescription from a qualified and
certified medical practitioner and for very clear indications are not recommended.
